summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Tamayyuz student behavior tracking platform. Backend APIs working at 94.1% success rate, frontend fully functional with excellent Arabic RTL support and responsive design.

minor_bugs.issue: Returns 403 instead of expected 401 for unauthorized access
minor_bugs.impact: Very low - proper security behavior, just different status code

passed_tests: Landing page with Arabic RTL layout and features display
Admin dashboard with statistics and top students display
Teacher dashboard with student management and behavior recording
Student dashboard with points display and behavior history
Arabic text rendering and RTL support
All CRUD operations for students and behavior records
